name: Inna V. Pivkina
content: Inna Pivkina Inna V. Pivkina's Home Page About myself I am an associate professor in the Computer Science department at New Mexico State University. I got my PhD in Computer Science at the University of Kentucky . My CV Teaching Learning Discrete Mathematics and Computer Science via Primary Historical Sources Schedule of NMSU classes. NMSU Academic Calendar. NMSU Las Cruces Academic Catalog. CS catalog entry. Graduate school. List of CS faculty & Staff. CS intranet. Canvas Log In. International Student Admissions at NMSU. Undergraduate Admissions at NMSU. Research Interests Computer science education, data mining applications, natural language processing, knowledge representation and reasoning. Contact information Mailing address: Dr. Inna Pivkina Department of Computer Science 1290 Frenger Mall SH 123 Las Cruces, NM 88003-8001 Office: SH 172. Phone: (575) 646-6237. Fax: (575) 646-1002. e-mail: inna (at nmsu.edu) URL: http://www.cs.nmsu.edu/~ipivkina I was one of the organizers of Summer School on Logic Programming and Computational Logic , July 24-27, 2008. Related links Novosibirsk State University (The university I graduated from) Institute of Mathematics of Siberian Branch of Russian Academy of Sciences (The research institute I used to work at) Miscellaneous I enjoy hiking a lot. Take a look at a photo of me at the top of South Rabbit Ear in Organ mountains.
